content.raw:
Yes I think so. I was leaving it for a bit so that @shjohnst could make sure he didn’t run into any issues. I haven’t heard of anything though so I think it’s all good. 

Could you bump the version and tag a new release once it’s merged in too? \(I think it probably needs to be 2.9.0 due to previously merged features since 2.8\).

Also, it could be good to update lyse to depend on this new version.
content.html:
Yes I think so. I was leaving it for a bit so that @shjohnst could make sure he didn’t run into any issues. I haven’t heard of anything though so I think it’s all good.

Could you bump the version and tag a new release once it’s merged in too? (I think it probably needs to be 2.9.0 due to previously merged features since 2.8).

Also, it could be good to update lyse to depend on this new version.
